entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 09:48 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -40.5°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -44.7°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
